cause.description:
Bring the Cary HS Marching Band to Indianapolis, Indiana for the 2007 BOA Grand Nationals! We only need $33,000! Please help and start thinking about ways to raise the $$!
1. Help raise the $$ to go to Nationals.
2. Help the Cary HS Band make all its hard work worth it.
3. Help to make the Class of 2008 go out with a bang!
4. For Mr. Minick!
cause.mission: Bring the Cary HS Marching Band to Indianapolis, Indiana for the 2007 BOA Grand Nationals!
cause.name: Grand Nationals Trip '07
